issue.title: [CF 437] IsSetBonusActive Condition
issue.body:

I've setup a condition for each slot that checks if i'm wearing either the raidfinder, normal or heroic setpiece:

Then i setup another condition checking each possible combination to wear atleast 4 set items: 5 (possible slots) x 4 (items at least worn) = 20 Conditions

This works, but is rather complex to setup. I even dont have in mind how many conditions i'd have to setup if i needed to check if i'm wearing atleast a 2 set bonus. Since every setbonus has a spellID, i guess there might be a better solution to check if a bonus is active?

comments.body:
Aside from the obvious option of simply being aware of what gear you are wearing, a Lua condition could accomplish this more efficiently. It is unlikely that I would implement a condition made specifically to check this.

You can't check using the actual set bonus spells since they aren't buff/debuffs, nor are they spells in your spellbook.

Here is the Lua condition that should accomplish this purpose:

``` ( --[[ helm ]] (IsEquippedItem(78798) or 0) + (IsEquippedItem(78722) or 0) + (IsEquippedItem(78703) or 0) + --[[ shoulder ]] (IsEquippedItem(78845) or 0) + (IsEquippedItem(76344) or 0) + (IsEquippedItem(78750) or 0) + --[[ chest ]] (IsEquippedItem(78826) or 0) + (IsEquippedItem(76345) or 0) + (IsEquippedItem(78731) or 0) + --[[ gloves ]] (IsEquippedItem(78777) or 0) + (IsEquippedItem(76348) or 0) + (IsEquippedItem(78682) or 0) + --[[ pants ]] (IsEquippedItem(78817) or 0) + (IsEquippedItem(76346) or 0) + (IsEquippedItem(78722) or 0) ) >= 4 ```

It should be fairly self explanatory. The number at the very end is the number of pieces that must be equipped - change it to 2 to check for 2pc. If you change around items, just make sure that the very last one doesn't have a plus.

Here is the actual export string for this:

^1^T^SBindText^S4PC ^SType^Sconditionicon ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SLUA ^SName^S(~`~`~`~` --[[~`helm~`]]~`~`~`~`(IsEquippedItem(78798)~`or~`0)~`+~`~`~`~`(IsEquippedItem(78722)~`or~`0)~`+~`~`~`~`(IsEquippedItem(78703)~`or~`0)~`+~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~` --[[~`shoulder~`]]~`~`~`~`(IsEquippedItem(78845)~`or~`0)~`+~`~`~`~`(IsEquippedItem(76344)~`or~`0)~`+~`~`~`~`(IsEquippedItem(78750)~`or~`0)~`+~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~` --[[~`chest~`]]~`~`~`~`(IsEquippedItem(78826)~`or~`0)~`+~`~`~`~`(IsEquippedItem(76345)~`or~`0)~`+~`~`~`~`(IsEquippedItem(78731)~`or~`0)~`+~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~` --[[~`gloves~`]]~`~`~`~`(IsEquippedItem(78777)~`or~`0)~`+~`~`~`~`(IsEquippedItem(76348)~`or~`0)~`+~`~`~`~`(IsEquippedItem(78682)~`or~`0)~`+~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~` --[[~`pants~`]]~`~`~`~`(IsEquippedItem(78817)~`or~`0)~`+~`~`~`~`(IsEquippedItem(76346)~`or~`0)~`+~`~`~`~`(IsEquippedItem(78722)~`or~`0))~`>=~`4 ^t^Sn^N1 ^t^SCustomTex^S589 ^SEnabled^B ^t^N50006^S~`~| ^Sicon^^
